Instruction: Trim the ends of the Brussels sprouts and cut them in half.
In a large bowl, toss the halved Brussels sprouts, fresh cranberries, chopped pecans, maple syrup, olive oil, salt, and black pepper until well combined.
Spread the mixture evenly on a baking sheet.
Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the Brussels sprouts are tender and caramelized, stirring halfway through.
Remove from the oven and transfer to a serving dish.
Serve hot as a flavorful and festive side dish.
